Name: Re Painter
About the game: “Re Painter” is a short, top-down action game where your drawings become your special attacks. Come up with your very own “Ultimate Move” to defeat your enemies. The main character is an unemployed artist with no redeemable talent. What’s worse, no one has ever recognized or complimented her art. In a world where “Handsome Characters”, “Realistic Sceneries”, “Sexy Ladies” are embraced with open arms and treated as “art”, most artists start to question their existence. But instead of doing so, the main character decides to take her frustration out on the 4 grandmasters of art... the “KAMIESHI”. It’s up to you to help her out. We’ve prepared drawing tools for the player. So even if you don’t have an artistic bone in your body, you’ll be able to draw some interesting patterns. If you’re confident in your drawing skills, you can try drawing freehand as well.
